feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2023-05-17
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 494 deliverables listed | 2023-05-03 => 2023-05-17 There were 0 modifications, 0 removals, and 2 additions (with 1 returning) in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.

entry.title: Scheduled Deliverables - 2023-05-17
entry.summary: There are currently 86 scheduled deliverables being worked on by 47 teams
